theAlchemist:Overheal.NAME: Overheal
theAlchemist:Overheal.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you heal for more than your max HP, gain the difference in Regeneration

theAlchemist:LeadToGold.NAME: Lead to Gold
theAlchemist:LeadToGold.DESCRIPTION: Remove target's Block. Gain gold equal to !M! times the amount of Block removed.

theAlchemist:Ignis.NAME: Ignis
theAlchemist:Ignis.DESCRIPTION: Basic_Element. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

theAlchemist:Aer.NAME: Aer
theAlchemist:Aer.DESCRIPTION: Basic_Element. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the last card played this combat was an Element, gain [E] . NL Exhaust.

theAlchemist:Terra.NAME: Terra
theAlchemist:Terra.DESCRIPTION: Basic_Element. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

theAlchemist:Aqua.NAME: Aqua
theAlchemist:Aqua.DESCRIPTION: Basic_Element. NL Heal !M! Health and gain 2 Regeneration. NL Exhaust.

theAlchemist:Glacies.NAME: Glacies
theAlchemist:Glacies.DESCRIPTION: Stage_1_Element. NL Gain !B! Block and !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

theAlchemist:Fulgur.NAME: Fulgur
theAlchemist:Fulgur.DESCRIPTION: Stage_1_Element. NL Deal !D! Damage to all enemies

theAlchemist:Naturae.NAME: Naturae
theAlchemist:Naturae.DESCRIPTION: Stage_1_Element. NL Heal !M! Health and gain 3 Vitality

theAlchemist:Tremor.NAME: Tremor
theAlchemist:Tremor.DESCRIPTION: Stage_1_Element. NL Deal !D! Damage and apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

theAlchemist:Mortem.NAME: Mortem
theAlchemist:Mortem.DESCRIPTION: Stage_2_Element. NL Deal !D! Damage to a random enemy for each card in the Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

theAlchemist:Vita.NAME: Vita
theAlchemist:Vita.DESCRIPTION: Stage_2_Element. NL Heal !M! HP. Gain 7 Vitality and 3 Regeneration. NL Exhaust.

theAlchemist:PotionJunky.NAME: Potion Junky
theAlchemist:PotionJunky.DESCRIPTION: Deal Damage equivalent to the amount of buffs you currently have.
theAlchemist:PotionJunky.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NL Increase all buffs by 1 stage.

theAlchemist:Violation.NAME: Violation
theAlchemist:Violation.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card from your Exhaust pile. Deal 4 damage to self.
theAlchemist:Violation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards from your Exhaust pile. Deal 4 damage to self.

theAlchemist:Spillage.NAME: Spillage
theAlchemist:Spillage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain a potion, use its ability
theAlchemist:Spillage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain a potion, use its ability

theAlchemist:BeakerBash.NAME: Beaker Bash
theAlchemist:BeakerBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and add a Broken Beaker into your hand.

theAlchemist:NewBeginnings.NAME: New Beginnings
theAlchemist:NewBeginnings.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Curse and Status cards in your hand. Replace them with random Basic_Elements. NL Exhaust.
theAlchemist:NewBeginnings.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Curse and Status cards in your hand. Replace them with random Basic_Elements.

theAlchemist:TransmutationCircle.NAME: Transmutation Circle
theAlchemist:TransmutationCircle.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a Stage_1_Element or Stage_2_Element, upgrade it.
theAlchemist:TransmutationCircle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you draw any Element, upgrade it.
